content: materials required * 20-25gr of 4ply 100% cotton yarn 200g=800m 2 fine * crochet hook 1 75mm * scissors * tapestry needle * 25cm metal hoop note the pattern does not contain guide on attachment of the additional components - only crochet instructions pattern does not contain crochet scheme note unlike our other patterns this one does not contain video tutorial finished mandala size is 25cm when using the recommended yarn and hook size cotton yarn and 1 75mm hook
